DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate impact participation Cancer Clear Simple ( CC & S ) educational session cancer prevention screen . The researcher recruit 60 community member : 30 receive CC & S training ( intervention group ) 30 ( control group ) . All 60 survey intent change behavior begin study actual behavior change screen behavior 6 month enrollment study .
DOC.brief_title: A Community Based Approach Reducing Rural Cancer Disparities , Aim 2
